product_name: Sea to Summit eVent Compression Dry Sack
long_description: Backpacker April '07 notes this sack's genius ''...lies in the breathable membrane, which moves trapped air out of the sack more easily...''. This valve-free dry sack uses a breathable base made of waterproof fabric, which allows air to be pushed out, but keeps water from entering. Waterproof and air-permeable eVent(TM) 70-denier nylon fabric has reinforced stitching on all stress points for durability. Polyurethane coating offers the ultimate in waterproofness; waterproof seams are tape sealed and double stitched for added weather protection. Roll-top Hypalon(R) closure with lid and four straps evenly compresses and maintains compressed size. Compact and lightweight design; features a pull handle on bottom for easy transport.
short_description: Backpacker April '07 notes this sack's genius ''...lies in the breathable membrane, which moves trapped air out of the sack more easily...''.
